name: chipBot
description:
Demo of our upcoming game: chipBot!

Move - Arrows, 

Jump - S, 

Interact - W, 

Action1 - A, 

Action2 - D, 

Enter - Leaderboard/Start, 

Shift - Map, 

Esc - Pause

Intro song: Orange Dreamsicle by ORU

Gameplay theme: Zero Fear by Atcero

Visit our promo page, if you will:

Consider joining our discord server to help us make this game better
